Container.Name: surlatablo
Container.Description: This docker sets up a daily cron job utilizing SurLaTablo to automate pulling media from a Tablo device based on query criteria configurable by the user.[br] http://community.tablotv.com/discussion/1411/surlatablo-py-python-program-to-query-and-convert-tablo-recordings[br] http://endlessnow.com/ten/SurLaTablo/[br] [b]/config[/b] : This is where surlatablo will store it\'s configuration.[br][br] [b]/data[/b] : This is where surlatablo will store converted tablo streams for plex to access.[br][br] [b]/transcode[/b] : This is where surlatablo will temporarily store transcode session files.[br][br]
